required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Prevalence and Consequences of Vitamin D Deficiency in Pregnant Women in Switzerland
clinical_study.official_title: Prevalence and Consequences of Vitamin D Deficiency in Pregnant Women in Switzerland

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine the prevalence of vitamin D deficiency among the population of pregnant women receiving prenatal care and giving birth at the investigators' clinic. The further purposes are to identify the population at risk for vitamin D deficiency and to analyse whether vitamin D deficiency is associated with pregnancy complications.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Between the 1th and the 36th week of pregnancy
primary_outcome.description: Number of patients with vitamin D deficiency after testing of vitamin D blood level at admission for prenatal care in our clinic

secondary_outcome.measure: BMI as a risk factor for vitamin D deficiency
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Between the 1th and the 36th week of pregnancy
secondary_outcome.description: Presence of an association between the patient's BMI and their vitamin D blood level?

secondary_outcome.measure: Ethnicity as a risk factor for vitamin D deficiency
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Between the 1th and the 36th week of pregnancy
secondary_outcome.description: Presence of an association between the patient's ethnicity and their vitamin D blood level?

secondary_outcome.measure: Age as risk factor for vitamin D deficiency
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Between the 1th and the 36th week of pregnancy
secondary_outcome.description: Presence of an association between the patient's age and their vitamin D blood level ?

secondary_outcome.measure: Period of the year as risk factor for vitamin D deficiency
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Between the 1th and the 36th week of pregnancy
secondary_outcome.description: Presence of an association between the period of the year at the time of the blood testing and the vitamin D blood level?

secondary_outcome.measure: Smoking Status as risk factor for vitamin D deficiency
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Between the 1th and the 36th week of pregnancy
secondary_outcome.description: Presence of an association between the patient's smoking status and the vitamin D blood level ?

secondary_outcome.measure: Association between vitamin D blood level and gestational diabetes mellitus
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Between the 1th and the 36th week of pregnancy
secondary_outcome.description: Presence of an association between the vitamin D blood level and the occurrence of gestational diabetes mellitus?

secondary_outcome.measure: Association between vitamin D blood level and gestational hypertension and preeclampsia
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Between the 1th and the 36th week of pregnancy
secondary_outcome.description: Presence of an association between the vitamin D blood level and the occurrence of gestational hypertension and preeclampsia ?

other_outcome.measure: Association between vitamin D blood level and the mode of delivery at birth
other_outcome.description: Presence of an association between the vitamin D blood level and the mode of delivery (Vaginal delivery, instrumentalized delivery, primary and secondary cesarean)?

other_outcome.measure: Association between vitamin D blood level and the gestational age at delivery
other_outcome.description: Presence of an association between the vitamin D blood level and the gestational age at delivery? Occurrence of preterm birth (before 37W) or postterm birth (after 40W)?

other_outcome.measure: Association between vitamin D blood level and newborn growth
other_outcome.description: Presence of an association between vitamin D blood level and the occurrence of intrauterin growth retardation or small-for-gestational age child? With assessment of measure like length, weight, head perimeter.

study_pop.textblock: All the pregnant women attending prenatal care and giving birth at birth at our clinic

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Pregnant women attending prenatal care at our clinic who had a vitamin D blood-testing at admission
Exclusion Criteria:
- Pregnant women lost to follow-up, Birth outside our clinic
